articles.author: Kiran Rathee
articles.title: Deferred spectrum dues to make up most of 30% telecom revenue jump - Economic Times
articles.description: Apart from the spectrum proceeds, Rs 20,000 crore is expected from licence fees (LF) and Rs 2,500 crore to Rs 3,000 crore from spectrum usage charges (SUC). Both the levies are computed based on the adjusted gross revenue (AGR) of telcos.
articles.content: New Delhi: A 30% jump in the expected revenue to 89,469.17 crore from the telecom sector in FY24, as estimated in the budget, will be primarily made up of the deferred spectrum payments from the 2021… [+2676 chars]

articles.title: Twitter discontinues its free API access, paid version in the pipeline - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: Yet another attempt to increase its revenue stream.
articles.content:
